stories.text: How many of you work in an environment that sometimes feels like a dysfunctional family where it seems like managers and leadership tolerates non-social behaviors for far too long and thus creates a toxic climate that undermines productivity and ultimately leads to turnover?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is your team or work like a dysfunctional family?

stories.text:
Hi all, 
If the russian government made efforts to thwart messaging/calling apps and also made it a crime to communicate with Ukraine.. what would be good strategies for people to stay in touch and avoid raising flags?
stories.title: Ask HN: Advice on Phone/Messaging/etc.
